# Load Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Load data

```{r}
analysis_dat_aug_04 <- read.csv(here("data/03_dat_aug_04.csv"))
```

```{r}
# Filtrer data for genet CCNO
ccno_data <- analysis_dat_aug_04 |> 
  filter(name == "CCNO")
# Fit line√¶r model
ccno_model <- lm(count_value ~ count_type, data = ccno_data)

# Se resultaterne af modellen
ccno_model |> 
  summary()
```
